title: UAVSAR - All Variables (Subdaily)
description: NASA's Uninhabited Aerial Vehicle Synthetic Aperture Radar (UAVSAR) provides high-resolution L-band polarimetric radar imagery for Earth observations. This subdaily collection captures rapid changes and includes multiple products: amplitude data showing radar backscatter intensity, correlation measurements for change detection, interferometric products for surface deformation analysis, and polarimetric decompositions for characterizing surface properties. UAVSAR's fine spatial resolution and multiple polarization channels enable detailed monitoring of natural disasters, including earthquakes, volcanic activity, landslides, floods, oil spills, and wildfire impacts.
